name: silverBell
description: A tiny silver bell. It shines in the light.

verbInteractions.Open: You'd rather not break it open.
verbInteractions.Listen: You can hear the bell jingle as it moves.
verbInteractions.Flip: It jingles, but nothing else happens.
verbInteractions.Examine: A tiny silver bell. It shines in the light.
verbInteractions.Take: You pick up the bell and slip it into your pocket.
verbInteractions.Peel: You'd rather not break it open.
verbInteractions.Drop: You leave the bell somewhere safe.
verbInteractions.Shake: You shake the silver bell. It makes a pleasant tinkling sound.
